columns.name: db_snapshot_identifier
columns.description: The friendly name to identify the DB snapshot.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB snapshot.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Provides the type of the DB snapshot.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Specifies the status of this DB snapshot.

columns.name: create_time
columns.description: Specifies when the snapshot was taken.

columns.name: allocated_storage
columns.description: Specifies the allocated storage size in gibibytes(GiB).

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: Specifies the name of the Availability Zone the DB instance was located in, at the time of the DB snapshot.

columns.name: db_instance_identifier
columns.description: Specifies the DB instance identifier of the DB instance this DB snapshot was created from.

columns.name: dbi_resource_id
columns.description: The identifier for the source DB instance, which can't be changed and which is unique to an AWS Region.

columns.name: encrypted
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB snapshot is encrypted, or not.

columns.name: engine
columns.description: Specifies the name of the database engine.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: Specifies the version of the database engine.

columns.name: iam_database_authentication_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether the mapping of AWS IAM accounts to database accounts is enabled, or not.

columns.name: instance_create_time
columns.description: Specifies the time when the DB instance, from which the snapshot was taken, was created.

columns.name: iops
columns.description: Specifies the Provisioned IOPS (I/O operations per second) value of the DB instance at the time of the snapshot.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: Specifies the AWS KMS key identifier for the encrypted DB snapshot.

columns.name: license_model
columns.description: Specifies the License model information for the restored DB instance.

columns.name: master_user_name
columns.description: Provides the master username for the DB snapshot.

columns.name: option_group_name
columns.description: Provides the option group name for the DB snapshot.

columns.name: percent_progress
columns.description: The percentage of the estimated data that has been transferred.

columns.name: port
columns.description: Specifies the port that the database engine was listening on at the time of the snapshot.

columns.name: source_db_snapshot_identifier
columns.description: The DB snapshot ARN that the DB snapshot was copied from.

columns.name: source_region
columns.description: The AWS Region that the DB snapshot was created in or copied from.

columns.name: storage_type
columns.description: Specifies the storage type associated with DB snapshot.

columns.name: tde_credential_arn
columns.description: The ARN from the key store with which to associate the instance for TDE encryption.

columns.name: timezone
columns.description: The time zone of the DB snapshot.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: Provides the VPC ID associated with the DB snapshot.

columns.name: db_snapshot_attributes
columns.description: A list of DB snapshot attribute names and values for a manual DB snapshot.

columns.name: processor_features
columns.description: The number of CPU cores and the number of threads per core for the DB instance class of the DB instance when the DB snapshot was created.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags attached to the DB snapshot.
